text:
*Did you know you can trigger surveys by enrolling members into a workflow that manages a property which functions as a criteria for Surveys?*

We enroll members right after they set up a ticket with our bot or use one of the FAQs. The magical part is you can even use this to delay surveys, we only send one to members every 15 days!

*Did you know your Bot action names are just as important as their actual functions?*

What is your team trying to resolve, what goal are you trying to achieve? If you don't track it, you can't improve it!

*Here's some great Bot resources to kick off the channel from the fantastical <@UDPJ43B39>!*
> <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/chatflows/create-a-bot|Create a bot>: There are several templates available to you with some standard bots -- bots to book meetings, create tickets, etc. You can start building off of one of these, or start from scratch.
> <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/conversations/a-guide-to-bot-actions|Choose bot actions>: This resource outlines the various bot actions you can add
> HubSpot Academy chat bot <https://academy.HubSpot.com/lessons/chatbots-in-HubSpot|lesson>
> <https://blog.HubSpot.com/customers/creating-a-chatbot-strategy|Here> is a HubSpot blog post about creating a chatbot strategy -- it includes some good examples and best practices
> A <https://blog.HubSpot.com/marketing/chatbots-improve-customer-experience-experiment|case study> from HubSpot’s chatbot strategies

*Here's some decent resources to get started on Code Snippets and Webhooks for Bots!*
> *Developer Documents*
>  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversations/code-snippets-in-bots|Running code snippets in bots>
>  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversations/webhooks-in-bots|Working with webhooks from bots>
>  <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/workflows/webhook_information|Using webhooks in workflows>
>  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/webhooks|Webhooks API Overview>
> 
> *GitHub*
>  <https://github.com/HubSpot/botsworkshop|Lambda Bot Workshop>
> 
> *Community Conversations*
>  <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Tickets-Conversations/Add-a-pause-to-chat-bot/m-p/332422|Add a pause to chat bot> & <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C22PU4LV8/p1587392070235900|Slack Convo>
>  <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Advanced-replies-from-bot-webhook/td-p/289817|Advanced replies from bot webhook>
>  <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Chatbots-API-or-not/td-p/222486|Chatbots: API or not?>

purpose: Use this channel to discuss chat flows, bots, and everything else all in between!
